products.name: Summit Seeker 2-Person Tent
products.description: Lightweight and durable tent for backpacking. Quick setup, waterproof fly. Perfect for mild to moderate weather conditions.

products.name: Family Basecamp 6-Person Tent
products.description: Large, multi-room tent with standing height and ventilation. Ideal for family holidays and long stays.

products.name: Ultra-Light Bivy Sack
products.description: Minimalist, waterproof shelter for solo fast-and-light adventures. Extremely packable.

products.name: Cozy Cloud 20F Sleeping Bag
products.description: Ultralight mummy sleeping bag, rated for 20°F (-7°C). Synthetic insulation, compressible stuff sack included. Great for spring and fall camping.

products.name: Summer Breeze Sleeping Bag
products.description: Rectangular sleeping bag rated for 40°F (4°C). Cotton lining, machine washable. Perfect for car camping and summer nights.

products.name: Double-Wide Sleeping Bag
products.description: Extra-large sleeping bag for two adults. Fleece lined for ultimate comfort. Ideal for couples.

products.name: Footprint Alpine Guide 2
products.description: Footprints shield your tent floor from the cooler—and sometimes wet or abrasive—ground, prolonging the life of the tent floor. You can also use them in fly-only pitching with most models.

products.name: Men's Radical Agile Mid NTO-tech
products.description: Prevail over Mount Hood with panache in these women's half crampon-compatible mountaineering boots with a waterproof NTO-tech membrane that deliver excellent traction on challenging, mixed terrain.

products.name: Women's Verto S4k NTO-tech Boots
products.description: Single-person titanium cooking pot and lid. Extremely light, perfect for minimalist backpacking.

products.name: Fovero 70
products.description: Don't leave anything at home during your next extended stay in the backcountry with this 70-liter technical pack that's designed for exceptional load management and organization of up to 70 pounds of gear.

products.name: Homestead Roadsoda Pack
products.description: A camp necessity, this waterproof, 43-liter backpack with an origami construction and a roll-top closure transforms into a rugged cooler when you add ice and a six pack. A 9-hook closure even doubles as a bottle opener.

products.name: Sun Shield Ball Cap
products.description: Protect your face and neck from the sun while hiking or climbing with this dynamic ball cap, purpose-built with a longer brim and detachable cape for maximum coverage. Durable Quick-Dry nylon dries quickly and delivers Ultraviolet Protection Factor (UPF) of 50, Max weight 150kg.
